name: Maid's Melancholy
description:
Maid's Melancholy is a puzzle game where you become a maid and perform various tasks. 'Clara', an apprentice maid, has to perform various tasks at the Belmond House in order to become a full-time maid recognized by the state. Can Clara safely pass the exam and become a full-time maid?

Features

  • Various minigames
    You can play about 10 mini-games such as serving, hunting, cleaning, and more! Aim for the highest score in each minigame!

  • Various Achievements
    There are more than 30 different achievement elements in Maid's Melancholy. Achieve numerous achievements in the game!
